page.title: 02Transport in Newborough.
page.content: Transport used in Newborough includes cars, buses and bicycles. The village does not have a regular bus service of its own but the villagers hope to have one soon. From 26 households interviewed,59 people have cars ,17 people have bikes,5 people have motorcycles,2 people have lorries and 16 people use the bus. The husbands of the households have 25 cars between them,one motorcycle and two bicycles.Two of them use the bus service.Out of the wives interviewed 23 of them have cars,nine of them have bicycles and seven use the bus service. The young people have between them six bicycles,one motorcycle,11 cars and seven use the bus service.
